name: MECHBETH
description:
A Virtual Reality Spider-Mech simulator where the player takes on the role of a prisoner forced to take this "one last job" with a promise of freedom

Having a spider mech could be a lot of fun, it's why I made this prototype, to see how it feels like to be in a machine that can behave like a spider,  mainly was curious how it would feel like to climb walls and walk upside down on ceilings 

Clear the cave system, mine crystals & shoot stuff while keeping an eye on your team member BETH, because if she dies, you die..

Made in 2 weeks during MECHJAM II

Current build is Mobile VR  (Oculus Quest 1 & 2)

PC Standalone and PC-VR builds will be available soon
